description: This file defines a React component named FavoritesPage that displays a list of favorite recipes, allowing users to view, remove, or clear them. It interacts with the FavoritesContext and navigates within the app.

methods.name: FavoritesPage()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the favorites list with actions for viewing and managing favorites.

methods.name: openRecipe
methods.description: Navigates to the detailed view of a selected recipe.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Navigates back to the home page.
